extends Observable
implements GameConsequenceHandler

    This method do nothing because there is no consequence from the action who invoked this

    • Game

      public Game​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> playersNickname, java.util.List<Color> colors, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Card> nicknameCardMap, VirtualView virtualView)
      constructor of the Game class
      Parameters:
      playersNickname - is the list of players that will play this game
      colors - is the enumeration of possible colors assignable to the players
      nicknameCardMap - is where is mapped a nickname's player to his chosen card
      virtualView - the virtualView of the match

    • getPossibleActions

      public java.util.List<Action> getPossibleActions​(java.lang.String playerName, int row, int column)
      which are the possible actions that i can do with the selected pawn if i can't do any move with the pawn i lose the game
      Parameters:
      playerName - player name
      row - the row coordinate of the pawn
      column - the column coordinate of the pawn
      Returns:
      the list of possible actions

      row - the row of the pawn that wants to force an opponent pawn

      this method is used when there is a DestroyBlockPlayer
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - is the name of the DestroyBlockPlayer
      Returns:
      the list of cells where the not-moved pawn can destroy a block

    • movePawn

      public void movePawn​(java.lang.String playerName, int row, int column, int newRow, int newColumn)
      the current player move the pawn based on his decoration
      Parameters:
      playerName - player name
      row - the row coordinate of the pawn that he wants to move
      column - the column coordinate of the pawn that he wants to move
      newRow - the row coordinate of the new position of the pawn
      newColumn - the column coordinate of the new position of the pawn

    • pawnBuild

      public void pawnBuild​(java.lang.String playerName, int pawnRow, int pawnColumn, int buildRow, int buildColumn, int level)
      the current master build based on the position of the pawn he has moved
      Parameters:
      playerName - player name
      pawnRow - the row coordinate of the pawn that have to build
      pawnColumn - the column coordinate of the pawn that have to build
      buildRow - the row coordinate of the cell that i want to build in
      buildColumn - the column coordinate of the cell that i want to build in
      level - the level of the building that i want build, the level indicate a unique building

    • forceOpponent

      public void forceOpponent​(java.lang.String playerName, int pawnRow, int pawnColumn, int opponentRow, int opponentColumn)
      This method forces the opponent pawn to his symmetrical cell in relation to the current player's pawn
      Parameters:
      playerName - is the name of the player
      pawnRow - is the row of the current player's pawn
      pawnColumn - is the column of the current player's pawn
      opponentRow - is the row of the opponent player's pawn that will be forced
      opponentColumn - is the column od the opponent player'a pawn that will be forced

      this method is used when there is a DestroyBlockPlayer
      Parameters:
      playerName - is the name of the player
      row - is the row of the cell where a block will be destroyed
      column - is the column od the cell where a block will be destroyed

      public void receiveConsequence​(Consequence consequence)
      receives the consequence of an action this method is a part of the visitor pattern once the consequence is received, is handled by the game handler

      Parameters:
      consequence - is a consequence of an action
